A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: I do not know where to even begin with all of the ways that this movie sucks. Not fun\, awkward excessive attempts at humor\, scenes beyond Jar Jar cringe worthy (space Leia)\, boring plot devices that have nothing to do with the movie (code master)\,  Marvel superhero style characters\, shoddy editing\, abysmal CGI\, bizarre pseudo sexual tension between Kylo and Rey.  Yes\, this movie is worse than Phantom Menace.  Perhaps one of the worse big budget movies ever made. The critics must have been paid off to give good reviews by Disney.
